context.description: New User-defined Node Project wizard Use this wizard to create an user-defined node project. When you have created the project, you can then develop a user-defined node.

topic.label: Creating the user interface representation of a user-defined node in the workbench

context.description: Convert to User-defined Node Project wizard Use this wizard to convert a message flow project to a user-defined node project. When you have created the project, you can then develop a user-defined node.

topic.label: Creating the user interface representation of a user-defined node in the workbench

context.description: New User-defined Node wizard Use this wizard to create a user-defined node. You must have already created the project that contains the user-defined node.

topic.label: Creating the user-defined node plug-in files

context.description: Package and Distribute User-defined Nodes Choose the type of the package for the user-defined nodes.

topic.label: Packaging and distributing a user-defined node project

context.description: Package and Distribute User-defined Nodes Choose the user-defined nodes to be packaged.
Package and Distribute User-defined Nodes Specify additional details of the package.
Package and Distribute User-defined Nodes Distribute the user-defined nodes package over Web or Network.
Package and Distribute User-defined Nodes Package user-defined nodes as Eclipse Plug-in.
Convert to User-defined Node wizard Use this wizard to convert a message flow to a user-defined node. You must have already created the project that contains the user-defined node.

topic.label: Creating the user-defined node plug-in files

context.description: Plug-in Node editor - Terminals page Define the input and output terminals on the plug-in node. You must define an input terminal; output terminals are optional.

Plug-in Node editor - Properties page Add and remove properties that users can configure on the plug-in. These properties are displayed when the user clicks the Properties item on the node's context menu.
